item.description:
By popular demand, we will be going to the 7:50PM 2D showing. This is opening night, so buy your ticket in advance. I will be in the lobby by the escalators at 7:15, and heading to get seats around 7:30.

Beforehand you will find me at Remington's of Boston. It doesn't get great Yelp reviews, but Stoddards is too pricy, IMHO. I'll be there around 6PM. I hope you can recognize me from my profile pics.

  • 124 Boylston St, Boston 02116
  • (Btwn Tremont & Charles St)

File under "so bad it might be really good", Hansel (Jeremy Renner) and Gretel (Gemma Arterton) are all grown up, and now they're hunting witches, including one played by Famke Janssen. With Gatling guns.

Check out the red band trailer (NSFW due to language):
http://youtu.be/ErGy23X0B9Q

I've left time and location open, since that information hasn't been published yet. I'm flexible on which night to see it, too. All I ask is that we meet beforehand to fortify ourselves with a few drinks. :)
item.name: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters
